title.narrative: Student Teacher Ratio, Top 25th Pct, Primary
Health: Increased utilization of health services among poor and near-poor households from less than 1 outpatient visit per capita to at least 1.5 per capita

comment.narrative: Baseline / outcome pending analysis of FIES and NHIS tagging

title.narrative: Health: Reduced out-of-pocket payments for health care among insured poor households.

comment.narrative: Baseline / outcome pending analysis of FIES and NHIS tagging
Reflects current closing date of DPL 2. Program DPL 3 end to be confirmed at Board passage anticipated 9/2014/

title.narrative: Enhanced budget transparency through the existence of a unified Account Code Structure, including the Chart of Accounts, and the timely publication of budget execution data.

comment.narrative: The budget code and chart of accounts differ. Quarterly budget execution by agency not yet available within 2 months of eachquarter
UACS used for 2015 budget, and validation of extent to which agencies have shifted from old NGAS accounting system to UACS for allexecution financial reports
UACS was used for 2014 budget, quarterly budget implementation by agency being posted within 2 months

title.narrative: Ease of Doing Business/Days to Register a Business (Sole Propietorships)

comment.narrative: Value greater than ten days, but not exact baseline available
Value remains greater than ten days. DTI is seeking sample analysis for 3 LGUs as value is national plus local processes
